94122.「えー。ここから 街道沿いに東へ進むとー\n ピィピのお宿という 集落に出ますー:
Eh.... If you go east along the road from here, you will come to a village called Pipi's Inn. Furthermore... If you continue along the
road from there, you will reach a village called Pukulet Village where Pukulipo live. If you have not been there yet, it would be good
to go there once.

94123.「ごきげんようー 旅の人。\n 私は 行商人のクバンといいますー。\n 以後 お:
Cheery hello, travelers. My name is Kuban, a peddler. I hope to make your acquaintance from now on. My job is to carry goods from the Town
of Orphea to various places on this wagon. I'm heading to Glitter Windmill Tower via Pukulet Village and Orpha Hill. If you want, I will
give you a ride.

10168001.「ごきげんようー 旅の人。\n 私は 行商人のクバンといいますー。\n 以後 お:
Cheery hello, travelers. My name is Kuban, a peddler. I hope to make your acquaintance from now on. My job is to carry the goods from Town
of Orphea to various places by this wagon. I'm heading to Glitter Windmill Tower via Pipi's Inn and Pukulet Village. If you want, I can
give you a ride.

40242.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「あたい お笑い:
I love comedy. The chief of Pukulet Village told me to check here to see if there are any funny people. But I can't find any. There are
not many people who are as passionate about laughter as the residents of Pukulet Village.

41347.「……ぷっ！ あはははっ！\n ひさしぶりに カラダを張った\n ギャグに 立ち:
Pfft! Ha-ha-ha! It's been a while since I've witnessed a gag that involved my body and soul! Ha-ha-ha! You've got great taste in

40243.「……ぷっ！ あはははっ！\n ひさしぶりに カラダを張った\n ギャグに 立ち:

40244.「笑いのためなら どんな恥ずかしい格好も\n してみせるなんて あなた\n スゴ:

dress up in any embarrassing way for a laugh.
I admire you.

39327.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あれほど来ていた:
Recently, orders for Choco-God Plushie from Gartlant, which used to come in so many times, have completely stopped. Is the boom already
over? Was my ambition to revolutionize the character business a lost dream?

39375.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あんた オルフ:
Do you know the giant doll that sits in the circle tent in the Town of Orphea? That's the Cake God, a very appreciated statue. Well,
I've taken a cue from the Cake God and created a brand new cute and catchy character. I call him the Chocolate God! As the name suggests,
he is a chocolate-colored Cake God! I'm going to use him to revolutionize the character business!

39376.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あんた オルフ:
Do you know the giant doll that sits in the circle tent in the Town of Orphea? That's the Cake God, a very appreciated statue. I've
taken the Cake God as my inspiration and created a brand new cute and catchy character called the Choco-God Plushie. For now, I'm
selling the Choco-God Plushie, which is selling quite well. Especially in the Gartland Castle area, I feel that a boom is coming,
thanks to the efforts of the retailers.

39377.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あんた オルフ:
Do you know the giant doll that sits in the circle tent in the Town of Orphea? That's the Cake God, a very appreciated statue. I took
the Cake God as my inspiration and created a brand new cute and catchy character, the Chocolate God. Hmm? Mr. Zackes' store selling
Choco-God Plushies in Gartlant Castle Town has been shut down?

39378.<icon_exc>「え…えらいこっちゃあー！！\n<br>\n「今のところ チ:
What a mess! So far, Choco-God Plushie is only selling under Gartlant Castle. If the boom ends here, my ambition to revolutionize the
character business will be lost. I will not let that happen! How can we save Mr. Zackes? You're here to help, aren't you? Well, it
would be nice if you could prove that the Choco-God Plushie is available to everyone. That would make things easier! I've only got a
few odds and ends to work with, but if you're looking for proof, this should do the trick. Go ahead, take this!

39380.「それがあれば チョコ神ぬいぐるみを\n 作っているのが わしだということが\n:
That would prove that I am the one making the
Choco-God Plushie.

40516.「ザッケス氏を救うため……\n ひいては わしの野望を守るために\n その ぬい:
To save Mr. Zackes, and by extension, to
protect my ambitions, please make sure you
deliver that stuffed animal to me!

39381.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ザッケス氏の:
We have received an additional order from Mr. Zackes' stuffed animal shop! It seems that they have successfully reopened for business.
For a while I wondered what would happen, but my ambitions are far from over. I'm going to start a revolution!

46350.<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を <%nEV_QUE_S_NUM0>匹 たおし:
I killed <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and
<%nEV_QUE_S_NUM0>! We have killed
<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>!

59248.「ああ～ん。あたし セクシーなお姉さ～ん。\n エレガントな物が 大 大 大好き:
Ah~n. I'm a sexy sister. I love all things elegant. I'm going to become an apprentice hairdresser. There's a store called Salon in
the City of Megistris, way to the west, and it's about to open, so please come visit.

59249.「あたし サロン・フェリシアの見習い美容師～。\n 今度 美容院で使う\n 新し:
I am an apprentice hairdresser at Salon Fee Lycia. I'm going to create a new color for the salon. I want to make a sexier and more
elegant color, but I need a gemstone called Night Whisper that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> has. I heard that the monster in Sage's Lair in
Popola Region drops Night Whisper, but it's very strong, so it's impossible for me to get it.

59250.「ああ～ん。そんなセクシーボイスで あたしの\n お願いを聞いてくれるなんて カ:
Ah~n. It's so wonderful that you listen to my request with such a sexy voice. I was so excited to hear her voice that I fainted~. If
I kill a few <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, they should drop the Night Whisper sooner or later~. Hang in there, hang in there, hang in there. Hang
in there, hang in there, hang in there.

59251.「ああ～ん。そんなセクシーボイスで あたしの\n お願いを聞いてくれるなんて カ:
Ah~n. It's so wonderful that you listen to my request with such a sexy voice. I unintentionally fainted at the sound of her
voice. Oh no~. But it seems you are full of other people's requests~. Come again when you're free~.

59252.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「ああ～ん。そんなセ:
Ah~n. To refuse my request with such a sexy voice... Sauzetsu and Monsetsu~... I fainted unintentionally at the sound of her voice. The
more sexy and elegant sister color that comes from Night Whisper. It's too bad~.

61581.<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_att:
<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><icon_exc>No. You are such a Strongholdgirl~. Ah~n. Go
get me that Night Whisper I've been begging
for~~.<else><attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><icon_exc>No. You are such a Stronghboy~. Ah~n. Go get
me that Night Whisper I've been begging for~.<endif>

59253.「ああ～ん。ポーポラ地方の 賢者の隠れ家にいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
Ahhhh, I need to defeat <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in
Sage's Lair in Popola Region to get a gem
called Night Whisper.<open_irai><bw_break>

63703.「よりセクシーで エレガントな色を作るためには\n その宝石が どうしても必要な:
I really need those gems to make the color more sexy and elegant~. Hang in there, hang in there, hang in there. Hang in there, hang in
there, hang in there.

59254.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ああ～ん。ちょ:
Ah~n. I can't stand it~. I really need to hear that, no matter how much I want to. Night Whisper calling me to Sosetsu. I can't hold
back any longer. Give me Night Whisper.

59255.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「ああ～ん。そんなの:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ahh~n. I don't want to do that. I'm whispering
right in front of you and you're teasing me...
I just fainted and I'm so nervous.

59256.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「いやん。あたし:
I'm too happy. I'm too happy! With this, I can make the long-awaited, sexier, more elegant sister color~. Then, I'll be making new colors
at a blinding speed. Good luck. I'll do my best.

59257.「うう～ん<heart> そんなに ささやいちゃダメ～ん。\n 待ってるの～。夜:
<heart> Don't whisper so much. I'm waiting for
you, Night Whisper. I'll extract the colors
soon.<bw_break>

59258.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ああ～ん。すん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ah~n. It's too good~. This completes Salon's
new color~. I call it midnight color~.

59259.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ああ～ん。あな:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ah~n. You're doing too good a job~. This is a
gift from me to you~. Feel free to accept it~.

59260.「このセクシーな ミッドナイト色は 美容院なら\n どのお店でも 使えるようにし:
This sexy midnight color is available at all Salon locations. It's too good for you, so give it a try~. In order to become a sexier,
more elegant, and more beautiful lady, I've been studying the magic of beauty without sleep~. Like Madame Felicia, you too should be
conscious of being seen by others, and try to look good while you're bending down~. It's so wonderful to see someone who is so dazzling~.

59306.「マジカル セクシー♪ マジカル セクシー♪\n マジで ときめけ！ カルめに:
Magical Sexy Magical Sexy Magical Sexy Seriously, I can't wait to see you! Sexy dynamite full throttle Sexy Dynamite Full
Throttle!

59265.「よりセクシーに よりエレガントで\n ステキなお姉さんになるため 寝る間も惜し:
In order to become a sexier, more elegant, and more beautiful sister, I've been studying the magic of beauty even while I sleep~. Like
Madame Felicia, you too should be conscious of being seen by others and bend down~. It's so wonderful to see someone who is so dazzling~.

126163.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こんにちは！:
Hi, I'm looking for an adventurer with the blessing of the War Mother! I'm looking for an adventurer with the blessing of the War
Mother. Well, I guess you're different. If you have received the War Mother's blessing and wish to release your next level of power, then
we can talk again!

126164.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こんにちは！:
Hello, I'm Nazuna, a light guide! I'm Nazuna, a light guide, and I'm looking for adventurers who have received the blessings of the War
Mother. Huh? But you seem to be a little too young to be guided by me, so come back when you've finished guiding Light Guide Meemi!

126165.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あたしは光導使:
I'm Nazuna, a light guide, and you are a fighting warrior blessed by the War Mother, right? Meemi told me about you! Do
you remember how the guiding light embodies the spirit of the Light Lord, one of the Six Saints? I am the Light Lord's compassionate
spirit. A heart that loves and forgives all. That's what it means to be compassionate! Like a Guiding Light I will guide you to the
release of your next power!

126166.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「やってくれるん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You're going to do it, aren't you? May light
be with you!

126167.「やってくれるんだね！\n って きみ 頼まれごとでいっぱいみたいだよ？\n そ:
You're going to do it for me, huh? You seem to be full of requests. No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no! Let's go and sort out the
requests! When you're done, please talk to me again.

126168.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「えー。そんなあ。\:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no. Oh, no. If you don't release my power,
I'll go to the Light Lord.

126169.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あたしは 六聖:
I am Nazuna, a Light Guide serving the Light Lord, one of the Six Saints. I am guiding the chosen fighting warriors to release more
power. The Light Guide embodies the spirit of the Light Lord, and I govern the Lord's mercy, that is, compassion. Like a Guiding Light I
will lead you to the next release of your power!

126170.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「光導使っていう:
As a light guide, I not only serve the Light Lord, one of the Six Saints, but I also embody the spirit of the Lord. I am in charge of the
Light Lord's compassion. If you want to liberate more power, you should show your love too.

126172.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……さってと。:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Let's get on with it. Let the liberation
begin! I'll leave this with you! When I give
you the signal, hold it up high.

126173.「ええー！？ しょうがないなあ！\n それじゃ 準備ができたら\n また あたし:
What? I can't help it! Well then, please talk
to me again when you're ready.

126174.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「今ので チカラ:
Now the release of power is over! You look so good, full of new power! If you receive the guidance of us three light guides, I'm sure
you'll be able to seize this power with certainty!

126175.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「それから！ あ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>And then, I'll tell you why the Light Lord we
serve is hidden! I'll tell you why the Lord of
Light, whom we serve, is hiding from you.<bw_break>

126176.「あたしたちがお仕えする 聖光教主さまは\n 六聖陣のひとりとして 女神ルティア:
As one of the Six Saints, the Light Lord we serve has been given a mission by Goddess Lutiana. That mission is to keep the mighty
power of the Holy Light in your body. It is said that this power will be shared with the warriors who fight in the great battle against
the source of darkness, and that it will give them a strong body that can withstand any demon miasma. In order to keep his mighty
power in his body and fulfill his mission, the Light Lord went into a deep sleep and hid himself away. But now that the times call for
the strong, if you continue to grow in strength, the Lord will eventually reveal himself to you!

126177.「だけど 今はまだその時じゃない。\n 残念ながら すべては光の導きによって\n:
But now is not the time. Unfortunately, everything is predestined by the light. For that day to come, try aiming for level 86 now.
Definitely, definitely, definitely aim for it! Eh? Why are you so enthusiastic? That's obvious! I want to meet my beloved Lord Light!
And yet, unless the chosen fighting warrior appears, even we Light Guides won't be able to meet the Light Lord! Don't you think it's
terrible? Aah! Love is always sad.

126178.「最後の光導使を 訪ねれば\n 自ずと きみの成すべきことは 見えてくる。\n<:
Visit the last of the light guides and you will see what you need to do. The name of the third lightbearer is Menna, and she should be
at Mogare Camp on the Mogarim Highway by now. And please, wake the Light Lord from his slumber, if only for a moment! If the chosen
warriors don't show up, even we, the light guides, won't be able to see the Light Lord! Don't you think that's terrible! Ahh..! Love
is always sad.

126179.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「最後の光導使は:
What was that about the last light guide? You have already met Menna, haven't you? Does that mean that the Light Lord is finally
coming?What should I do? I can't stay like this!

126184.「姿を隠した聖光教主さまに お会いするためには \n いくつか段階が 必要なの。:
There are several steps to meeting the hidden Lord of Light. Now it's time to visit the last of the light guides. The name of the third
light bearer is Menna, and she should be at Mogare Camp on the Mogarim Highway by now. And please, wake the Light Lord from his sleep, if
only for a moment! If the chosen warriors don't show up, even we, the light guides, won't be able to see the Light Lord! Don't you
think that's terrible! Ahh..! Love is always sad.

126185.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「姿を隠した聖光:
There are several steps required to meet the hidden Light Lord, but it seems that Menna has already met him. So it looks like the Light
Lord is finally here!What should we do? I can't stay like this!

143537.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「えーっ！？\n:
What? You already tried to meet the Light Lord? I promised the Light Lord that the three of us would meet him together, but Menna is
just awful!

143538.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「でも なんで: <attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>But why didn't the Lord hear my voice?

153106.「ミナナ……！\n あたしたちの仲間……\n 早く 会いに行かなきゃ！\n<br:
Minana! Our companion, I can't wait to meet
you! You must come too, <pc>! I
promise!

144093.「<pc>のおかげで ミナナに\n また会えて よかった！\n<br>\n「今度:
Thanks to <pc>, I am glad to see
Minana again! Now you get to meet the Light
Lord. Ahhh..! But I'm so nervous!

145023.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「聖光教主さまの:
The Light Lord's awakening time is near! I can't tell you how long I've been waiting for this day. I'm looking forward to seeing you
get the Justice Crest safely! May the blessings of the Light be with you!

145024.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「聖光教主さまに:
I wish I could have fluffed Light Lord more. Fluffy is the word. It's the feeling of being soft and fluffy! It's very comfortable!
did your best, so next time you see the Light Lord, you should let him fluff you up!

34966.「仕事中でなかったら オルフェアの町の\n ナブナブ大サーカスを観にいくんだがな:
If I wasn't at work, I would be going to see
the Great Nabunabu Circus at the Town of
Orphea. What a pity.

44836.「ステキで楽しい ピィピのお宿は\n こちらでございますよ～。\n さて……。<:
Pipi's Inn, a lovely and fun place to stay, is
located here. Well...<bw_break>
